title: Indian Navy Recruitment 2017 Jobs Vacancies Opening

organizations.name: apply online/ offline complete details & apply online executive and technical branch

text:
Last Updated Friday, February 17, 2017 Advertisement 
The Indian Navy is the naval branch of the armed forces of India, under Ministry of Defence, Government of India. Indian Navy (Nausena Bharti) Career and Opportunity in various Entries (Officer Entry, Sailor Entry, Women Entry). Indian Navy Official Career Website is http://nausena-bharti.nic.in . IndGovtJobs very glad to provide Indian Navy Recruitment 2016-2017 / Vacancy Opening Details on this Post - Jobs listed on the following Table. Young Indian National Candidates (Male / Female) wish to Join Indian Navy. 
Indian Navy Current Jobs Openings 2017 (Last Updated on February 2017 ) Type of Entry / Organization Name of Post â€“ No of Vacancies Last Date for Apply Online/ Offline Complete Details & Apply Online Executive and Technical Branch Jan 2018 Course 24/02/2017 Parachute Regiment Training Centre Bangalore LDC, Cook, MTS (Mali) - 05 02/03/2017 Click Here >> 
Officer Entry -> 
(1) Executive (General Service Officer, Submarine Officer, Hydrographic Officer, Diving officer, Naval Armament Inspection Officer, Law Officer, Provost Officer, Logistics Officer, Pilot Officer, Information Technology, Observer Officer) (2) Engineering (Engineering General Service Officer, Submarine Engineer Officer, Naval Construction Officer) (3) Electrical (General Service, Submarine Electrical Officer) in Cadet Entry (NDA), 10+2 (B.Tech) Cadet Entry, University Entry Scheme (SSC), Short Service Commission (GS), Short Service Commission (Submarine) (4) Education (Education Officer in Short Service Commission, Permanent Commission) (5) Medical (Doctors in Short Service Commission, Permanent Commission)
